/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.report.service.impl.ReportMapper.getCurrproc ====== */ SELECT LS.YYYY, LS.TERM, LS.SUBJECT_CODE, LS.CLASS SUB_CLASS, LS.CLASS AS SUBJECT_CLASS, LS.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE, CASE WHEN LS.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE = 'OJT' THEN 'OJT' ELSE 'Off-JT' END SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE_NAME, LS.SUBJECT_NAME, LS.DEPARTMENT_NAME, LS.GRADE, LS.POINT_USE_YN, LS.POINT, LS.SUBJECT_TYPE, CASE WHEN LS.SUBJECT_TYPE = 'NORMAL' THEN '학부' ELSE '고숙련' END SUBJECT_TYPE_NAME, LS.ONLINE_TYPE,
CASE WHEN LS.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE = 'OFF' THEN ROUND((DECODE(LS.LCTRE_TIME,0,NULL,LS.LCTRE_TIME)+DECODE(LS.TEST_EXEC_TIME,0,NULL,LS.TEST_EXEC_TIME)) * 15 / FLOOR((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LMS_SUBJ_WEEK WEEK WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND WEEK.YYYY = LS.YYYY AND WEEK.TERM = LS.TERM AND WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE = LS.SUBJECT_CODE AND WEEK.CLASS = LS.CLASS ))) ELSE 0 END OFF_TIME_HOUR,
CASE WHEN LS.ONLINE_TYPE IN ('104','105') THEN '플립러닝' WHEN LS.ONLINE_TYPE = '101' THEN '순수온라인' WHEN LS.ONLINE_TYPE = '102' THEN '브렌디드' WHEN LS.ONLINE_TYPE = '103' THEN '보조활용' ELSE '없음' END ONLINE_TYPE_NAME,
(SELECT SUM( TIME.LEAD_TIME ) FROM LMS_SUBJ_WEEK_TIME TIME WHERE TIME.YYYY = LS.YYYY AND TIME.TERM = LS.TERM AND TIME.SUBJECT_CODE = LS.SUBJECT_CODE AND TIME.CLASS = LS.CLASS AND TIME.DELETE_YN = 'N' ) AS TRANING_HOUR,
(SELECT LISTAGG(FN_GETUSERNAME(INS.MEM_SEQ), ',') WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY FN_GETUSERNAME(INS.MEM_SEQ)) FROM LMS_SUBJ_INS_MAPPING INS WHERE INS.YYYY = LS.YYYY AND INS.TERM = LS.TERM AND INS.SUBJECT_CODE = LS.SUBJECT_CODE AND INS.CLASS = LS.CLASS ) AS INS_NAMES,
(SELECT LISTAGG(FN_GETUSERNAME(CDP.MEM_SEQ), ',') WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY FN_GETUSERNAME(CDP.MEM_SEQ)) FROM LMS_DEPT_CDP_MAPPING CDP WHERE CDP.DEPT_NO = LS.DEPARTMENT_NO ) AS CDP_NAME,
(SELECT MIN(LSWT.TRANING_DATE) FROM LMS_SUBJ_WEEK_TIME LSWT WHERE LSWT.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND LS.YYYY = LSWT.YYYY AND LS.TERM = LSWT.TERM AND LS.SUBJECT_CODE = LSWT.SUBJECT_CODE AND LS.CLASS = LSWT.CLASS ) AS TRANING_ST_DATE, LS.YYYY AS ESTBL_YY, CASE WHEN LS.TERM = '1' THEN '101' WHEN LS.TERM = '2' THEN '102' WHEN LS.TERM = '3' THEN '103' ELSE '104' END ESTBL_SEMSTR_CD, LS.SUBJECT_CODE AS COURSE_NO,
LS.INSERT_DATE, LS.INSERT_USER, LS.UPDATE_DATE, LS.UPDATE_USER, LS.TRANING_HOUR, LS.FIRST_STUDY_YN, LSIMCM.MEM_NAME INS_NAME, LSIMCM.MEM_SEQ INS_SEQ,
( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LMS_SUBJ_WEEK_SCH LSWS WHERE LSWS.YYYY = LS.YYYY AND LSWS.TERM = LS.TERM AND LSWS.SUBJECT_CODE = LS.SUBJECT_CODE AND LSWS.CLASS = LS.CLASS AND LSWS.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND LSWS.START_DATE IS NOT NULL AND LSWS.END_DATE IS NOT NULL ) AS ON_SCEDULE_LEN
FROM LMS_SUBJECT LS LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CM.MEM_SEQ,CM.MEM_NAME,LSIM.YYYY,LSIM.TERM,LSIM.CLASS,LSIM.SUBJECT_CODE FROM LMS_SUBJ_INS_MAPPING LSIM,COM_MEMBER CM WHERE LSIM.MEM_SEQ=CM.MEM_SEQ AND LSIM.DELETE_YN='N' AND CM.DELETE_YN='N' ) LSIMCM ON LS.SUBJECT_CODE=LSIMCM.SUBJECT_CODE AND LS.YYYY = LSIMCM.YYYY AND LS.TERM = LSIMCM.TERM AND LS.CLASS = LSIMCM.CLASS WHERE LS.SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} AND LS.YYYY = #{yyyy} AND LS.TERM = #{term}
AND LS.CLASS = #{subClass}
AND LS.ONLINE_TYPE IN ('101','102','103','104','105')
AND LS.DEPARTMENT_NO = #{departmentNo}
AND LS.DELETE_YN='N' AND ROWNUM = 1

/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.report.service.impl.ReportMapper.reportList ====== */ SELECT LS.REPORT_ID, LS.YYYY, LS.TERM, LS.SUBJECT_CODE, LS.CLASS AS SUB_CLASS, LS.WEEK_CNT, LS.REPORT_NAME, LS.REPORT_DESC, LS.EVAL_YN, LS.SCORE, LS.SUBMIT_START_DATE, LS.SUBMIT_START_HOUR, LS.SUBMIT_START_MIN, LS.SUBMIT_END_DATE, LS.SUBMIT_END_HOUR, LS.SUBMIT_END_MIN, LS.ATCH_FILE_ID, LS.DELETE_YN, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_LESSON LL WHERE LL.SUBJECT_CODE=LS.SUBJECT_CODE AND LL.DELETE_YN='N' AND LL.YYYY=LS.YYYY AND LL.TERM=LS.TERM AND LL.CLASS=LS.CLASS ) TOT_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_REPORT_SUBMIT LRS WHERE LRS.REPORT_ID=LS.REPORT_ID AND LRS.DELETE_YN='N' ) SCORE_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_REPORT_SUBMIT LRS WHERE LRS.REPORT_ID=LS.REPORT_ID AND LRS.DELETE_YN='N' AND LRS.EVAL_SCORE > 0 ) SCORE_ON FROM LMS_REPORT LS WHERE LS.SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} AND LS.YYYY = #{yyyy} AND LS.TERM = #{term} AND LS.CLASS = #{subClass} AND LS.DELETE_YN='N'
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(LS.WEEK_CNT)

/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.report.service.impl.ReportMapper.reportListStd ====== */ SELECT LS.REPORT_ID, LS.YYYY, LS.TERM, LS.SUBJECT_CODE, LS.CLASS AS SUB_CLASS, LS.WEEK_CNT, LS.REPORT_NAME, LS.REPORT_DESC, LS.EVAL_YN, LS.SCORE, LS.SUBMIT_START_DATE, LS.SUBMIT_START_HOUR, LS.SUBMIT_START_MIN, LS.SUBMIT_END_DATE, LS.SUBMIT_END_HOUR, LS.SUBMIT_END_MIN, LS.ATCH_FILE_ID, LS.DELETE_YN, CASE WHEN LRS.ATCH_FILE_ID is null THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END as CHECK_YN, LRS.ATCH_FILE_ID AS LRS_ATCH_FILE_ID,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MM' ) BETWEEN LS.SUBMIT_START_DATE||' '||LS.SUBMIT_START_HOUR||':'||SUBMIT_START_MIN AND LS.SUBMIT_END_DATE||' '||LS.SUBMIT_END_HOUR||':'||LS.SUBMIT_END_MIN THEN '진행' WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MM' ) > LS.SUBMIT_END_DATE||' '||LS.SUBMIT_END_HOUR||':'||LS.SUBMIT_END_MIN THEN '완료' WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MM' ) < LS.SUBMIT_START_DATE||' '||LS.SUBMIT_START_HOUR||':'||SUBMIT_START_MIN THEN '예정' ELSE '' END AS SUBMIT_STATUS,
(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_REPORT_FEEDBACK FB WHERE FB.REPORT_SUBMIT_ID = LRS.REPORT_SUBMIT_ID AND FB.DELETE_YN = 'N' ) AS FEED_CNT
FROM LMS_REPORT LS LEFT OUTER JOIN LMS_REPORT_SUBMIT LRS ON LS.REPORT_ID=LRS.REPORT_ID AND LRS.DELETE_YN='N' AND LRS.INSERT_USER=#{sessionMemSeq} WHERE LS.SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} AND LS.YYYY = #{yyyy} AND LS.TERM = #{term} AND LS.CLASS = #{subClass} AND LS.DELETE_YN='N'
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(LS.WEEK_CNT)
